about_the_game:
O-5 has given you clearance to access the foundation's archive. Within are stored many documents of research and disasters that have happend throughout the countless sites. Documents describing death, d-class riots, terrifying anomalies and breaches. What happened here?

SCP: Archive is a "cooperative" multiplayer horror game where you and a group of friends play through several different stories ('archives') to escape the facility, research anomalies or start a breach to survive. Survival is not guaranteed, but maybe together you'll be alright? Based on the SCP Foundation, this game features many elements of the expansive collection of anomalies, along with some originals.

This game is meant to be played with friends or any other group you can gather. Proximity voice chat allows you to talk to your peers, or scream in terror as your associates' neck is broken by SCP-173.

Inside of the facility are many useful tools you can use to assist in your escape. Others are not so useful or even outright dangerous. It's up to you to decide what to use, when to use it and how to use it. Maybe think twice about throwing a seemingly innocent bouncy ball in the direction of a living human.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence like blood and death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Yeah you need that for sound and stuff
  • Additional Notes: A microphone is useful
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Also mute yourself on Discord...

short_description: A cooperative multiplayer horror experience where it's up to you and your associates to make it out alive. Survival is not guaranteed, so keep everyone at an arms length and expect to have your trust broken as you're shoved into an endless black pit.
